sherlock.imports.ifs_galaxies (module) ∞

Import IFS galaxies from the IFS galaxy stream

Author:David Young
Date Created:November 18, 2016

class sherlock.imports.ifs_galaxies.ifs_galaxies(log, settings=False, pathToDataFile=False, version=False, catalogueName='', coordinateList=[], radiusArcsec=False) ∞

The worker class for the ifs_galaxies module

Key Arguments:
  • dbConn – mysql database connection
  • log – logger
  • settings – the settings dictionary
  • pathToDataFIle – path to the pessto_marshall_streams data file
  • version – version of the pessto_marshall_streams catalogue
